message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate affects me more.
Your rate is higher, so I need a bigger cut to make it worthwhile. This is my counter-offer.
I understand your point, but I need a bit more security in the long run. This offer is a compromise.
The longer this goes on, the less we both get. Let's be fair and split it evenly.
We are running out of time! This is my final offer - it gives us both a reasonable amount.
